verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
All the Way, I'm going all the way (x3),
I'm going all the way with the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
No turning back, I'm going all the way (3x),
I'm going all the way with the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I've made my choice, I'm going all the way (3x),
I'm going all the way with the lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I've made my decision, I'm going all the way (3x),
I'm going all the way with the Lord.
